original_text: In his humiliation his judgment was taken away: and who shall declare his generation? for his life is taken from the earth.
korean_text: 그가 굴욕을 당했을 때 공정한 재판도 받지 못하였으니 누가 그의 세대를 말하리요 그의 생명이 땅에서 빼앗김이로다 하였거늘

sentences.original_text: and who shall declare his generation?
for his life is taken from the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그의 생명이 땅에서 거두어졌기 때문입니다
